english: No conjecture can be offered on the subject .
chinese: 关于这个问题不可臆测。
这些早期的臆测是很有趣的。

english: We mustn't condemn him on mere suppositions .
chinese: 我们切不可全凭臆测指责他。

english: The best way to turn off the speculation, he said, was to tell the truth .
chinese: 他说，停止那些臆测的最好办法就是说明真相。

english: She judged it unkind to her sister to mention to their father grounds of anxiety which might arise from her own imagination .
chinese: 要是把焦虑的原因告诉父亲，她又觉得对不起妹妹，因为这无非出于自己的臆测。
臆测造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The article has too many false presumptions
chinese: 这篇文章中凭空臆测的东西太多。
二十一世纪临床心理学的臆测

english: Now this whole theory . - eddie , just take the first reel
chinese: -现在，全部的臆测. -埃迪，就拿第一卷好了
你的理论纯粹是主观臆测
你的理论纯粹是主观臆测

english: Now this whole theory . . . . - eddie , just take the first reel
chinese: 现在，全部的臆测. . . . -埃迪，就拿第一卷好了

english: - now this whole theory . . . . - eddie , just take the first reel
chinese: -现在，全部的臆测. . . . -埃迪，就拿第一卷好了

english: Because it is our conjecture , so we can only use question mark
chinese: 因为这是我们的臆测，所以我们只能用问号结尾。

english: Without all the facts , helen could only conjecture a solution
chinese: 由于事实还没有全部完备，海伦只能臆测解决的方法。
